name: xpc_activity_state_t
desc: A type that represents the state of an activity.

items.name: var XPC_ACTIVITY_STATE_CHECK_IN: Int
items.desc: The activity has completed a check-in with the system.

items.name: var XPC_ACTIVITY_STATE_WAIT: Int
items.desc: The activity is waiting for an opportunity to run.

items.name: var XPC_ACTIVITY_STATE_RUN: Int
items.desc: The activity is eligible to run according to its criteria.

items.name: var XPC_ACTIVITY_STATE_DEFER: Int
items.desc: The activity needs to wait until it satisfies its criteria again.

items.name: var XPC_ACTIVITY_STATE_CONTINUE: Int
items.desc: The activity continues its operation beyond the return of its handler block.
